alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Herkimer County through 345 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holland Patent, or 7 miles north of Utica, moving east southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little Falls, Dolgeville, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Russia, Fairfield, Norway, West Frankfort, Garlock Corners, Curtis, Harbor, Farrel Corner, Countryman, Burrell Corners, Fink Basin, Kelhi Corners, Shedd Corners and Hurricane. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
